items.name: Arctic Fox Pilsner
items.desc:
Type : Pilsner / ABV : 4.6%
A GORGEOUS PILSNER! NOW IN A BIGGER BOTTLE!
Arctic Fox is our newest addition to the Crafty range. A gloriously refreshing, clean, crisp pilsner in the continental style. Skilfully layered with Pilsner and Vienna malts, Tettnang and Bobek hops, Arctic Fox has a gentle warmth with subtle notes of citrus and floral aromas. This delicious lager has been lovingly conditioned for 3 months to deliver a long, satisfying mellow flavour. Ideal for drinking on its own or paired with pizzas, pasta and barbecues. Served well chilled.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Blind Side Deep Amber Ale
items.desc:
Type: India Pale Ale / ABV: 4.0%
A quintessential deep amber ale. A truly fine example of a best bitter. Well balanced malt and hops combine to deliver a distinctive malty bitterness and a crisp refreshing finish.
We first introduced Blind Side to help celebrate the 2019 Rugby World Cup. It proved so popular that we brought it back for the 2020 Six Nations Championship and it’s been refreshing fans of great beer and rugby ever since. Only available until now as a cask ale in local Surrey pubs, we’ve now put it into 500ml bottles for everyone to enjoy at home.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Crafty Big Six
items.desc: Why not try our Crafty Big 6 selection pack. A combination pack with six of our best-selling and award-winning craft beers. Six 500ml bottles in total.

items.name: Crafty Dozen
items.desc: Why not try our Crafty Dozen selection pack. A carefully selected mix of our best-selling and award-winning craft beers. Twelve 500ml bottles in total.

items.name: Crafty One Pale Ale
items.desc:
Type: Pale Ale / ABV: 3.9%
This pale-straw coloured beer delivers complete satisfaction. The robust, international flavours of Chinook and Sorachi Ace hops combine with Maris Otter and the body-builder Cara-Pils malts to form a smooth and complex drinking experience. With refreshment levels going through the roof, this beer can be enjoyed at all times of the day (although before breakfast may be pushing it a little).
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Dunsfold Best Mild Ale
items.desc:
Type: Mild Ale / ABV: 4.0%
A true English ale made with classic English hops, grain and yeast. Crystal malt contributes an enticing caramel flavour and colour, while the base malt and yeast provide a smooth body. The Fuggles and First Gold hops deliver the characteristic flavour and nose of a quintessentially British ale. Dunsfold Best was a SIBA (The Society of Independent Brewers) Gold Medal winner at the Southeast Region Beer Competition 2016.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Gunner IPA
items.desc:
Type: India Pale Ale / ABV: 4.2%
Pints with Purpose. Gunner IPA is the official craft beer of The Royal Artillery. It is a modern classic. A lightly-hopped golden amber IPA bearing all the hallmarks of its four international hop superstars – Simcoe, Chinook, Amarillo and Perle. Refreshing citrus and floral grassy notes are mellowed by toasted fine English crystal malts.As one of Crafty’s ‘Pints with Purpose’,
Gunner IPA is a pint that tastes good and does good. For every litre purchased we make a donation to The Royal Artillery Charities to fund sport, adventure and challenge activities for serving soldiers and those who are injured, wounded or sick. Help us achieve our target of donating £20,000 per annum.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Gunner Pilsner
items.desc:
Type: Pilsner / ABV:5.0%
A Pint with Purpose: The official craft pilsner of The Royal Artillery. Gunner Pilsner is a refreshing, full-flavoured German-style pilsner. Expertly crafted with pale malts and the prince of ‘noble’ hops – Tettnang. This pilsner is conditioned for 12 weeks and naturally carbonated for a crisp, mouth-filling quaff.
As one of Crafty’s ‘Pints with Purpose’, Gunner Pilsner is a pint that tastes good and does good. For every litre purchased we make a donation to The Royal Artillery Charities to fund sport, adventure and challenge activities for serving soldiers and those who are injured, wounded or sick. Help us achieve our target of donating £20,000 per annum.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Hop Tipple IPA
items.desc:
Type: India Pale Ale / ABV: 4.2%
This delicious IPA won a SIBA Gold Award in 2017 for the South East, making it one of the finest IPAs in the UK. Maris Otter and Munich malts from Britain and Germany provide a platform from which the Cascade and Chinook hops shine out. Dry hopping adds a bold finish to this thoroughly thirst-quenching golden coloured beer.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Jimmy IPA
items.desc:
Type: India Pale Ale / ABV 4.2%Pints with Purpose.
Jimmy IPA is the official craft beer of The Royal Corps of Signals. It is a modern classic. A lightly-hopped golden amber IPA bearing all the hallmarks of its four international hop superstars – Simcoe, Chinook, Amarillo and Perle. Refreshing citrus and floral grassy notes are mellowed by toasted fine English crystal malts.
As one of Crafty’s ‘Pints with Purpose’, Jimmy IPA is a pint that tastes good and does good. For every litre purchased, we make a donation to The Royal Signals Charity to fund sport, adventure and challenge activities for serving soldiers and those who are injured, wounded or sick. items.name: Laughing Wolf APA
items.desc:
Type: American Pale Ale / ABV: 4.4%
You may have already tried Laughing Wolf on draught at your favourite pub, but now our American Pale Ale is available for you to enjoy at home. This deep amber 4.4% ABV APA is a big, Juicy delicious beer with notes of toast and citrus fruit. Dry-hopped and packed with Columbus and Citra Hops for a gloriously refreshing taste of the West Coast.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Loxhill Biscuit Golden Ale
items.desc:
Type : Golden Ale / ABV : 3.6%
A graceful golden beer brewed with Amarillo, First Gold and Challenger hops from the UK and USA. We use three malts; English Maris Otter, German Munich and the favourite, Belgian Biscuit, which gives this beer it’s wonderful toasty finish and beautiful golden hue. This beer brings a wonderful balance of sweet floral notes and a subtle orange finish, making it our favourite session beer.
Loxhill Biscuit won the Slaphead Shield Silver Award for the best beer at the Alton Beer Festival of 2019.
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.desc:

Expertly crafted with pale malts and the prince of ‘noble’ hops – Tettnang. This pilsner is conditioned for 12 weeks and naturally carbonated for a crisp, mouth-filling quaff.
As one of Crafty’s ‘Pints with Purpose’, Mercury Pilsner is a pint that tastes good and does good. For every litre purchased we make a donation to The Royal Signals Benevolent Fund to fund sport, adventure and challenge activities for serving soldiers and those who are injured, wounded or sick. Refreshing citrus and floral grassy notes are mellowed by toasted fine English crystal malts.As one of Crafty’s ‘Pints with Purpose’,
Pin In is a pint that tastes good and does good. For every litre purchased we make a donation to The RE Benevolent Fund Charities to fund sport, adventure and challenge activities for serving Sappers and those who are injured, wounded or sick. ‘PIn In’ tastes and by golly it does good!

items.name: Silver Horse IPA
items.desc:
Type: India Pale Ale / ABV 4.2%
Pints with Purpose. Silver Horse IPA is a delicious amber ale carefully crafted with Columbus and Citra hops to deliver a soft citrus taste on a background of lightly toasted crystal malt. Silver Horse IPA is brewed exclusively for the REME. But it’s not only a terrific craft beer that honours the men and women of the Corps – it also has a purpose: for every bottle purchased, The Crafty Brewing Co. makes a donation to the REME Charity to fund sport and adventure for all REME soldiers, including those who have been wounded. Raise a glass. Raise a toast. Raise a smile!
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: Silver Horse Pilsner
items.desc:
Type: Pilsner / ABV: 4.6%
REME Silver Horse Pilsner is a delicious German-style pilsner. Full flavoured and packing plenty of mouth-filling hops Silver Horse Pilsner is a crisp, refreshing background of lightly toasted Cara Pils malt.
Pints with Purpose. Silver Horse Pilsner is a ‘Pint with Purpose’ and is brewed exclusively for the Corps of Royal Electrical & Mechanical Engineers. It tastes good and by golly it does good. This delicious craft pilsner honours the men and women of the REME. For every litre purchased The Crafty Brewing Co. makes a donation to the REME Charity to fund sport and adventure for all REME soldiers including those who have been wounded. Raise a glass. Raise a toast. Raise a smile!
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!

items.name: The Crafty Mystery Box
items.desc:
Don’t judge a book by it’s cover…
Inside these boxes are the same great crafty beers you know and love.
Some may have scuffed labels (from the bottling process) which means they aren’t suitable for selling in the normal way. Some are overstocked branded beers for our restaurant customers.
No beers were harmed in the making of these boxes (any damage is purely cosmetic).
The equivalent of 24 x 500ml bottles for £50 inc delivery
The more you buy, the less you pay per bottle. The standard delivery charge for a pack of six 500ml bottles is £5 but if you buy 24 bottles or more in a single purchase your delivery is FREE anywhere in the UK!
